abstract.t: This document describes a new SRv6 segment type, called END.DTM. The END.DTM segment type supports inter-working between SRv6 and SR-MPLS. Like any segment type, END.DTM contains a function and arguments. The function causes the processing SRv6 node to remove an SRv6 header and impose an SR-MPLS label stack. The arguments determine MPLS- label stack contents.
